entry.title: Scaling Lightning With Simple Covenants
entry.summary: MuSig and MuSig2 are both n-of-n signing algorithms, meaning that all entities in the set, denoted as A_i for all i, and a dedicated Lightning Network (LN) node B, are involved in the signing process. This implies that the argument that 2-of-2 channels are non-custodial and trust-minimized can be extended to n-of-n for any value of n.Regards,ZmnSCPxj
